channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: USA Rare Earth CEO describes ‘Manhattan Project’ to wean U.S. from dependence on China
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Sam Altman’s eye-scanning orb startup says employees should only care about work—for the good of humanity—otherwise ‘you should just not be here’
item.description: “We work weekends, we're always on call, and we push as hard as our circumstances allow us to,” Tools for Humanity CEO Alex Blania said in a January s...

item.title: The IPO market is being re-globalized as Asia’s markets embrace dual listings and corporate governance reform
item.description: Asian companies are increasingly exploring the possibility of listing in non-U.S. markets.

item.title: ‘Don’t sell just because there’s a bubble,’ says Ray Dalio, but be prepared for low returns over be next 10 years
item.description: "I think the picture is pretty clear in that we are in that territory of a bubble, but we don't have the pricking of the bubble yet," Dalio said.

item.title: Skims founding partner Emma Grede schedules an ‘AI day’ once every six weeks to future-proof her career: ‘It’s like do or die’
item.description: Upskilling in AI is unavoidable as workers look to ‘future-proof our organizations and ourselves,’ Grede added.

item.title: Google Pixel 10 Surprise: iPhone Users Can AirDrop To Android — Will Apple Kill It?
item.description: Nobody outside Google seems to have seen this coming: a new update from Google means that Apple’ AirDrop will work between iPhones and Android. But wi...

item.title: How AI Is Ushering In A New Nuclear Age
item.description: Atomic energy is back, thanks to the ravenous demands of AI, favoritism from Trump, and the zeal of young entrepreneurs raising billions to build mini...

item.title: Ys X: Proud Nordics Comes Westward In February 2026. Is It Worth It?
item.description: Ys X: Proud Nordics finally has a release date in the West. However, it faces some challenges, including a frustrated fanbase and a packed release sch...

item.title: The P1 Repair Master Is A Pocket-Sized Thermal Camera Designed For Android And iPhones
item.description: The Thermal Master P1 Repair Master thermal camera works with the latest iPhones and Android devices and combines thermal imaging functions with measu...

item.title: Google Offers Gmail Upgrades—You Must Choose Carefully
item.description: Act now — Google has suddenly opted millions of you into its AI data harvesting, reading all your emails and attachments.

item.title: $1 million saved for retirement ‘ain’t what it used to be’
Walmart's strong quarter shows Americans are still spending
item.description: Walmart beats Wall Street expectations with strong food and health sales driving 6% revenue growth to $179.5 billion, raising outlook for fiscal 2026.

item.title: US added 119K jobs in September, delayed jobs report shows
item.description: The Labor Department released the September jobs report, which showed that job growth continued at a subdued pace amid economic uncertainty over trade...

item.title: December interest rate cut in doubt as Fed minutes show policymakers divided
item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers remain divided on December interest rate cuts as FOMC minutes revealed differing views on monetary policy amid inflation ...

item.title: DEI consultant resigns from Cracker Barrel board after heated proxy fight
item.description: Cracker Barrel shareholders backed nine of 10 board nominees, including CEO Julie Felss Masino.

item.title: Voters express economic worries over inflation as costs rise, Fox News poll finds
item.description: A Fox News poll shows 76% of voters view the economy negatively, with 61% disapproving of President Donald Trump's economic handling amid rising costs...

item.title: U.S stocks close lower after significant market reversal as tech selloff deepens
Why these two corners of the stock market just signaled cracks in the economy
Stocks set for biggest blown gain since April as Nvidia-inspired rebound falters
Why Congress likely won’t allow Trump to send out $2,000 tariff dividend checks
What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
